spell_tooltip.description:
Your Heroism spell now has a 60 sec. cooldown, but increases Haste by 20%, and only affects you and your friendly target when cast for 10 sec.

In addition, Heroism is no longer affected by Exhaustion.

Burrow beneath the ground, becoming unattackable, removing movement impairing effects, and increasing your movement speed by 50% for 5 sec.

When the effect ends, enemies within 6 yards are knocked in the air and take 614,995 Physical damage.
Primordial Wave summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec that increases the critical effect of damage and healing spells of all nearby allies within 46 yards by 15% for 15 sec.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 214,609 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 210,549 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 213,297 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 153,599 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 149,817 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 153,137 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Chills the target with frost, causing 164,752 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Generates 3 Maelstrom.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 9 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Summons a totem at the target location for 30 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, rooting all enemies within 9 yards for 8 sec. Enemies previously rooted by the totem instead suffer 50% movement speed reduction.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.
Purges the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1.2 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 11 yards 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 14,935 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's movement speed bonus is increased by 10% and now removes snares.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 30%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.3 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 335,451 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing 727,463 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by 7% or Mastery by 14% for 10 sec.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of the target location to tremble and break, dealing 264,168 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at a selected location.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 275% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Storm Elemental to hurl gusts of wind at your enemies for 24 sec.

While the Storm Elemental is active, casting Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning increases your haste by 4%, stacking up to 4 times.
Increases the critical strike chance of Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning by 10%.
Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake have a 25% chance to refund all Maelstrom spent.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Casting Lightning Bolt, Tempest, Lava Burst, or Chain Lightning has a chance to replace your next Frost Shock with Icefury, stacking up to 2 times.

 Icefury
Hurls frigid ice at the target, dealing 484,893 Frost damage and causing your next Frost Shock to deal 200% increased damage, damage 4 additional targets, and generate 7 additional Maelstrom.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature, Physical, or Frost spell by 15%.
After casting Icefury, the next time you cast a damaging Nature and Fire spell, you additionally cast an Elemental Blast at your target at 60% effectiveness.
Your next Chain Lightning, Tempest, or Lightning Bolt has 30% reduced cast time after casting Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake. Can accumulate up to 2 charges.

Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 50.

Increases Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake damage by 5%.
Elemental Fury increases critical strike damage by an additional 25%.
Casting Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Stormkeeper by 2.0 sec.

While a Storm Elemental is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 10%.

While a Fire Elemental is active, your Fire damage dealt is increased by 10%.
While Lightning Shield is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 8%.
Increases the duration of your Elementals by 20%.
Increases Earth Shock and Earthquake damage by 8% and the stat bonuses granted by Elemental Blast by 25%.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 40%.
Dealing direct Fire, Frost, and Nature damage within 10 sec will increase all damage dealt by 10% for 10 sec. This can only occur once every 30 sec.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 18 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
When your Storm Elemental or Fire Elemental expires, it leaves behind a lesser Elemental to continue attacking your enemies for 12 sec.

Tempest, Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake make your target a Lightning Rod for 12 sec.
 
Lightning Rods take 12% of all damage you deal with Tempest, Lightning Bolt, and Chain Lightning.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake can trigger your Mastery: Elemental Overload at 50% effectiveness.

Overloaded Earthquakes do not knock enemies down.
Your haste is increased by 20% while Ascendance is active and its duration is increased by 3 sec.
Increases the duration of Lightning Rod by 4 sec and its damage bonus by 25%.

After casting Earth Shock, your next Earthquake deals 120% additional damage.

After casting Elemental Blast, your next Earthquake deals 140% additional damage.

Each Maelstrom spent has a 0.12% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 18 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
Your Earth, Fire, and Storm Elementals are drawn from primal elementals 80% more powerful than regular elementals, with additional abilities, and you gain direct control over them.
Every 300 Maelstrom spent replaces your next Lightning Bolt with Tempest.

Spending Maelstrom grants you 1% haste for 15 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature damage spells by 5% and the critical strike damage of your Nature spells by 5%.
Tempest increases your movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.
Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning have a 50% chance to cause an additional Elemental Overload.

Tempest causes your next 2 Chain Lightning or Lightning Bolt spells to be instant cast and deal 40% increased damage.

Can accumulate up to 2 charges.
Gain one stack of Stormkeeper every 50 sec.
Earthquake and Chain Lightning damage increased by 5%.
Lightning Rod targets now also take 12% of the damage that Tempest deals, and Tempest also applies Lightning Rod effect.
Lightning Shield reduces the damage you take by 3%.
Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning have a chance to strike your target for 203,098 Nature damage. Every 3 times this occurs, your next Lightning Bolt is replaced by Tempest.

Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.

Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20%.

A maximum of 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 9 yards for 3 sec.
Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Summons a totem at the target location for 30 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, rooting all enemies within 9 yards for 8 sec. Enemies previously rooted by the totem instead suffer 50% movement speed reduction.
When Capacitor Totem fades or is destroyed, another Capacitor Totem is automatically dropped in the same place.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1.2 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
Summons a totem at your feet that shakes the ground around it for 13 sec, removing Fear, Charm and Sleep effects from party and raid members within 34 yards.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Transforms the enemy into a frog for 1 min. While hexed, the victim is incapacitated, and cannot attack or cast spells. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1. Only works on Humanoids and Beasts.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 11 yards 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 15,177 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 30%.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.3 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 335,451 every 5 sec for 30 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20%.

A maximum of 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.
Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 25% chance to trigger two extra attacks, dealing 8,568 Physical damage each.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 24,975 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by 6.0 sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to 5 nearby enemies.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.

Unleash a devastating storm around yourself, dealing 22,761 Stormstrike damage every 1 sec to nearby enemies for 8 sec.

Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.

Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 25% chance to trigger two extra attacks, dealing 8,535 Physical damage each.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 25,140 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by 6.0 sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to 5 nearby enemies.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.
Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash have a 100% chance to discharge electricity at your target, dealing 12,256 Nature damage.

Unleash a devastating storm around yourself, dealing 22,761 Stormstrike damage every 1 sec to nearby enemies for 8 sec.

Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Shatters a line of earth in front of you with your main hand weapon, causing 65,311 Flamestrike damage and Incapacitating any enemy hit for 2 sec.
Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 melee swings after dealing a critical strike with a spell or ability.
Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 29,184 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 8,663 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.
Stormstrike has a 25% chance to strike the target an additional time for 40% of normal damage. This effect can chain off of itself.

Stormstrike has an additional charge.

Stormsurge now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal 25% additional damage as Nature damage, stacking up to 2 times.

Instantly shocks the target and 5 nearby enemies with blazing thunder, causing 403,017 Nature damage and applying Flame Shock.

Generates 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 831,946 Elemental damage, and granting you Lava Surge.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.

Transform into an Air Ascendant for 18 sec, immediately dealing 66,079 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 20%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 100% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 4%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 1.0 sec.

20% chance to refund Maelstrom Weapon stacks spent on Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning.

Your Feral Spirits are now imbued with Fire, Frost, or Lightning, increasing your damage dealt with that element by 10%, but now only increase your Physical damage dealt by 10%.

Increases the damage of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 20%, and Deeply Rooted Elements lasts 2 sec longer.

While Ascendance is active, Windstrike automatically consumes up to 5 Maelstrom Weapon stacks to discharge a Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning at 100% effectiveness at your enemy, whichever you most recently used.

Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature damage spells by 5% and the critical strike damage of your Nature spells by 5%.

Can accumulate up to 2 charges.
Gain one stack of Stormkeeper every 50 sec.
Earthquake and Chain Lightning damage increased by 5%.

Lightning Shield reduces the damage you take by 3%.
Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning have a chance to strike your target for 199,254 Nature damage. Every 3 times this occurs, your next Lightning Bolt is replaced by Tempest.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 210,767 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 153,883 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
